title: [Large-Scale] ICT-Based Multimodal Group Music Composition Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary music theory and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Language domain application for professional learners and smartphone-centric collaborative environments.

learning_goals: Learners can implement multimodal (visual/auditory/text) composition processes within a group using ICT tools.

Learners can revise two of their own composition ideas based on feedback received from three peers on a digital platform (e.g., Noteflight, Soundtrap) and submit improved versions as audio files and scores, achieving at least 3 out of 4 points on the instructorâ€™s evaluation criteria (creativity, technical proficiency).
Learners can evaluate the efficiency of smartphone-based composition applications in limited-technology settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
